Title: La Grande Vadrouille
Writer: Gérard Oury (scenario), Danièle Thompson (adaptation), Marcel Jullian (adaptation), Georges Tabet (dialogue), André Tabet (dialogue)
Actors: Bourvil, Louis de Funès, Claudio Brook, Andréa Parisy
Plot: Several ordinary Frenchmen, helping British pilots avoid Nazi captivity, goes on an epic voyage through the occupied country to the Swiss border.
